paper_abstract: The Cluj index is a topological index that is defined as: [UM](ij) = max vertical bar upsilon(i,j,pk)vertical bar ; k = 1, 2, ... where, upsilon(i,j,pk) = {upsilon vertical bar upsilon is an element of V(G); d(i upsilon) < d(j upsilon i); (i, upsilon)(h) boolean AND p(k) = i; p(k) is an element of D(G)or Delta(G); h, k = 1,2, ... } In this paper, we find an exact formula for the Cluj index of TUC4C8(S) nanotubes.
paper_title: Computing Cluj Index of TUC4C8(S) Nanotube
